text: Hi guys so with my maybank FNF card if lets say I buy from NTUC  Redmart and the MCC is eligible for 8% cashback  if I pair with Amaze the same MCC will be used right? and I will still be eligible for 8% cashback
Yes. But u can just use the card direct also get 8% no extra benefits for using amaze for local spend on fnf
oh so there is no additional benefit to pair amaze with fnf ?
Local spend no extra benefits if use overseas u get a better exchange rates than the bank lo and the instapoints
oh wow I had no idea on that ! easier to just use fnf directly then haha
Actually if lock up 10k  you lose about $300 in interest per year on opportunity cost.If you do enough 4NF to recoup the $300 and annual fee then maybe make sense
ohhh UNLESS!! I go and spend in malaysia and pair it with fnf  then I will get 8% cashback + good exchange rate. right!? lol
